definition: A group of people who are related to each other, such as a mother, a father, and their children.
example: There are five people in my family.
koChirpScript: family! 가족이라는 뜻이에요. 예를 들어볼까요? There are five people in my family. 이건 한국어로 우리 가족은 다섯 명입니다.라고 해요.

definition: A female parent.
example: My mother is a doctor.
koChirpScript: mother. 무슨 뜻일까요? 바로 어머니!  으로 My mother is a doctor. 저의 어머니는 의사입니다.라는 의미죠.

definition: A male parent.
example: His father teaches math.
koChirpScript: father. 아버지라는 뜻이에요. His father teaches math.  이 문장은 그의 아버지는 수학을 가르칩니다.라는 뜻이랍니다.

definition: An adult male human being.
example: The man is reading a newspaper.
koChirpScript: man. 뜻은 바로 남자! 아주 간단하죠? 문장에서는 이렇게 쓰여요. The man is reading a newspaper. 그 남자는 신문을 읽고 있습니다!

definition: An adult female human being.
example: That woman is my aunt.
koChirpScript: woman 여자를 의미해요. 문장으로 배워볼까요? That woman is my aunt. 저 여자는 나의 이모입니다. 라고 할 수 있죠.

definition: The part of a person's body at the end of the arm, including the fingers and thumb.
example: Please wash your hands before eating.
koChirpScript: hand. 바로 손 입니다. Please wash your hands before eating. 식사하기 전에 손을 씻으세요. 처럼 활용할 수 있어요.

definition: Each of a pair of globular organs in the head through which people and animals see.
example: She has beautiful blue eyes.
koChirpScript: eye. 눈이라는 뜻이에요. 시력을 나타내죠! She has beautiful blue eyes. 그녀는 아름다운 파란 눈을 가졌습니다.라는 뜻이에요.

definition: Any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink to maintain life and growth.
example: I am hungry, I need some food.
koChirpScript: food. 음식입니다. I am hungry, I need some food. 배고파요, 음식이 좀 필요해요. 라는 뜻입니다.

definition: A type of food made from flour, water, and yeast mixed together and baked.
example: I eat bread and butter for breakfast.
koChirpScript: 빵을 영어로 뭐라고 할까요? 바로 bread.입니다. I eat bread and butter for breakfast.  나는 아침으로 빵과 버터를 먹는다. 라고 말할 수 있어요.

definition: A white liquid produced by female mammals as food for their young.
example: The baby is drinking milk.
koChirpScript: 이번 단어 milk. 우유라는 뜻이죠. The baby is drinking milk. 아기가 우유를 마시고 있다.라고 말하는 거랍니다.

definition: A current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes.
example: How much money do you have?
koChirpScript: money. 돈! 아주 중요하죠? How much money do you have? 돈을 얼마나 가지고 있나요?라고 물어볼 수 있어요.

definition: A word or a set of words by which a person, animal, place, or thing is known, addressed, or referred to.
example: What is your name?
koChirpScript: name. 이름입니다. What is your name? 이렇게 물으면 당신의 이름은 무엇입니까?라는 뜻이죠.

definition: The period of time from sunrise to noon.
example: I wake up early in the morning.
koChirpScript: morning. 아침을 의미해요. I wake up early in the morning. 나는 아침에 일찍 일어난다는 뜻이랍니다.

definition: The period of darkness in each twenty-four hours; the time from sunset to sunrise.
example: The stars shine bright at night.
koChirpScript: night. 밤이라는 뜻이에요. The stars shine bright at night. 밤에는 별들이 밝게 빛난다.는 아름다운 뜻이에요.

definition: Each of the twenty-four-hour periods, reckoned from one midnight to the next, into which a week, month, or year is divided.
example: Have a nice day!
koChirpScript: day. 낮 혹은 하루를 의미해요. Have a nice day! 좋은 하루 보내세요!라는 기분 좋은 인사죠.

definition: Perceive with the eyes; discern visually.
example: I can see a bird in the tree.
koExample: 나무에 있는 새를 볼 수 있어요.
koChirpScript: see. 눈으로 무언가를 보다라는 뜻이에요. I can see a bird in the tree. 나무에 있는 새를 볼 수 있어요.라는 뜻입니다.

definition: Direct one's gaze toward someone or something or in a specified direction.
example: Look at the beautiful sunset.
koChirpScript: look. 특정 방향을 의식적으로 바라보다는 느낌이에요. Look at the beautiful sunset. 아름다운 일몰을 보세요.라고 말할 때 쓴답니다.

definition: Utter words so as to convey information, an opinion, a feeling or intention, or a question.
example: Please say your name slowly.
koChirpScript: say 내용을 전달하며 말하다라는 뜻이에요. Please say your name slowly. 당신의 이름을 천천히 말해주세요.라고 부탁하는 문장입니다.

definition: Communicate information to someone in spoken or written words.
example: Can you tell me a story?
koExample: 나에게 이야기를 하나 해줄 수 있나요?
koChirpScript: tell. 이거는요. 누군가에게 정보를 이야기해주다 또는 알려주다는 뜻이에요. Can you tell me a story? 나에게 이야기를 하나 해줄 수 있나요?라고 묻는 거랍니다.

definition: Have a desire to possess or do (something); wish for.
example: I want a new bicycle for my birthday.
koExample: 나는 생일 선물로 새 자전거를 원해요.
koChirpScript: want. 무언가를 원하다는 뜻이죠. I want a new bicycle for my birthday. 나는 생일 선물로 새 자전거를 원해요.라는 말이에요.

definition: Take, hold, or deploy (something) as a means of accomplishing a purpose or achieving a result; employ.
example: Can I use your pen?
koChirpScript: use. 사용하다! 아주 유용하죠? Can I use your pen? 당신의 펜을 사용해도 될까요?라고 물어볼 수 있어요.

definition: Have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about someone or something.
example: I think it will rain tomorrow.
koChirpScript: think 생각하다 입니다. I think it will rain tomorrow. 내일 비가 올 거라고 생각해요.라는 추측을 나타내죠.

definition: Make an attempt or effort to do something.
example: You should try to finish your homework.
koGloss: v.시도하다, 노력하다, 애쓰다; n.(음식·옷을) 시험 삼아 해보다
koChirpScript: try. 시도하다 또는 노력하다는 뜻이에요. You should try to finish your homework. 숙제를 끝내도록 노력해야 합니다.라는 조언이에요.

definition: Adopt or be in a position in which one's weight is supported by one's buttocks rather than one's feet and one's back is upright.
example: Please, sit down.
koChirpScript: sit. 앉다! 아주 간단하죠? Please, sit down. 자, 앉으세요.라는 뜻입니다.

definition: Move (a door or window) so as to leave a space allowing access and vision.
example: Can you open the window?
koGloss: v.열다, 개방하다; adj.열려 있는, 영업 중인
koChirpScript: open. 열다라는 뜻입니다.  Can you open the window? 창문 좀 열어주시겠어요?라고 부탁하는 말이에요.

definition: Move (a door or window) so as to cover an opening.
example: Please close the door when you leave.
koChirpScript: close. 닫다라는 뜻입니다. open의 반댓말이죠. Please close the door when you leave. 나갈 때 문을 닫아 주세요.라는 뜻이죠.

definition: To be desired or approved of.
example: This is a very good book.
koChirpScript: good. 좋은 이라는 뜻이에요. This is a very good book. 이것은 아주 좋은 책입니다.라고 말할 수 있어요.

definition: Of poor quality; inferior or defective.
example: Rotten eggs have a bad smell.
koChirpScript: bad. 나쁜 이라는 뜻이에요. Rotten eggs have a bad smell. 썩은 달걀에서는 나쁜 냄새가 난다.는 뜻입니다.

definition: Produced, introduced, or discovered recently or now for the first time; not existing before.
example: I bought a new shirt yesterday.
koChirpScript: new. 새로운 이라는 뜻! 누구나 새 걸 좋아하죠.  I bought a new shirt yesterday. 나는 어제 새로운 셔츠를 샀다.는 뜻이에요.

definition: Having lived for a long time; no longer young.
example: My grandfather is very old.
koChirpScript: old! 늙은 또는 오래된이라는 뜻입니다. My grandfather is very old. 저의 할아버지는 매우 늙으셨습니다.라는 의미에요.

definition: Having a high degree of heat or a high temperature.
example: The weather is very hot today.
koChirpScript: hot. 요즘 여름 날씨 어떻죠? 그래요. 더운이라는 뜻이에요. The weather is very hot today. 오늘 날씨가 매우 덥습니다.라는 뜻이죠.

definition: Of or at a low or relatively low temperature.
example: It is cold outside, so wear a jacket.
koChirpScript: cold. 추운이라는 뜻을 가져요. It is cold outside, so wear a jacket. 밖은 추우니 재킷을 입으세요.라는 뜻이에요.

definition: Of a color at the end of the spectrum next to orange and opposite violet, as of blood, fire, or rubies.
example: An apple is often red.
koChirpScript: 색깔 단어 red. 빨간색입니다.  An apple is often red. 사과는 종종 빨간색이다.라는 뜻이에요.

definition: Of the color of milk or fresh snow, due to the reflection of all visible rays of light.
example: The clouds are white.
koChirpScript: white. 흰색입니다. The clouds are white. 구름은 흰색이다.라고 말할 수 있어요.
